pr_title: Created 'on block fertilize', added event-player, 'fertilized blocks'…

timeline.message: Created 'on block fertilize', added event-player, 'fertilized blocks' and event-block

timeline.bodyText: Since we're checking if this class exists and if im not mistaken its introduced in 1.16.1, it should be added here which version it works on for the docs
timeline.author: ShaneBeee
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -567,5 +568,11 @@
 			"\tif the clicked button is enchantment option 1:",
 			"\t\tset the applied enchantments to sharpness 10 and unbreaking 10")
 		.since("2.5");
+		if(Skript.classExists("org.bukkit.event.block.BlockFertilizeEvent"))

replies.bodyText: The fertilize event was added in 1.13, but yeah I'll add it there
replies.author: DeltaRays

replies.bodyText: Oh sorry I was thinking about the fertilize block method that was recently added. But yes, 1.13 should be added.
replies.author: ShaneBeee

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/ch/njol/skript/events/SimpleEvents.java b/src/main/java/ch/njol/skript/events/SimpleEvents.java
index 5d88c798..3b5c16b6 100644
--- a/src/main/java/ch/njol/skript/events/SimpleEvents.java
+++ b/src/main/java/ch/njol/skript/events/SimpleEvents.java

@@ -571,6 +571,7 @@ public class SimpleEvents {
 		if(Skript.classExists("org.bukkit.event.block.BlockFertilizeEvent"))
 			Skript.registerEvent("Block Fertilize", SimpleEvent.class, BlockFertilizeEvent.class, "[block] fertilize")
 			.description("Called when a player fertilizes blocks")
+			.requiredPlugins("Minecraft 1.13 or newer")
 			.examples("on block fertilize:",
 				"\tsend \"Fertilized %size of fertilized blocks% blocks got fertilized.\"")
 			.since("INSERT VERSION");

timeline.bodyText: same goes here, should annotate with RequiredPlugins("Minecraft 1.16.1+") (If that is the correct version it was added)
timeline.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.bodyText:
Just out of curiosity, did you test without these getters?
If im not mistaken Skript automatically gets block and player from events with these methods, I could be wrong.
timeline.author: ShaneBeee

replies.bodyText: Oh I didn't know that, I'll test
replies.author: DeltaRays

replies.bodyText: It works with block but not with player 🤔
replies.author: DeltaRays

replies.bodyText: Ok good to know. I know that often they're wonky, but I that could be an issue with how we've got them registered elsewhere.
replies.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.message: Removed the unnecessary event-block, added @RequiredPlugins and .requiredPlugins to ExprFertilizedBlocks and the Block Fertilize event

timeline.bodyText: each stream operation should be on its own line.
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk

timeline.bodyText: Operations that return a list are often worth implementing the iterator method. In this case, we are only creating instances of BlockStateBlock so it may not be needed though
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk

replies.bodyText: Yeah I'm not sure as to whether it is
replies.author: DeltaRays

timeline.message: Added an iterator method to ExprFertilizedBlocks

timeline.bodyText: Missing period at end of sentence.
timeline.author: ShaneBeee
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -567,5 +568,12 @@
 			"\tif the clicked button is enchantment option 1:",
 			"\t\tset the applied enchantments to sharpness 10 and unbreaking 10")
 		.since("2.5");
+		if(Skript.classExists("org.bukkit.event.block.BlockFertilizeEvent"))
+			Skript.registerEvent("Block Fertilize", SimpleEvent.class, BlockFertilizeEvent.class, "[block] fertilize")
+			.description("Called when a player fertilizes blocks")

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/ch/njol/skript/events/SimpleEvents.java b/src/main/java/ch/njol/skript/events/SimpleEvents.java
index 3b5c16b6..43d1d44c 100644
--- a/src/main/java/ch/njol/skript/events/SimpleEvents.java
+++ b/src/main/java/ch/njol/skript/events/SimpleEvents.java

@@ -570,7 +570,7 @@ public class SimpleEvents {
 		.since("2.5");
 		if(Skript.classExists("org.bukkit.event.block.BlockFertilizeEvent"))
 			Skript.registerEvent("Block Fertilize", SimpleEvent.class, BlockFertilizeEvent.class, "[block] fertilize")
-			.description("Called when a player fertilizes blocks")
+			.description("Called when a player fertilizes blocks.")
 			.requiredPlugins("Minecraft 1.13 or newer")
 			.examples("on block fertilize:",
 				"\tsend \"Fertilized %size of fertilized blocks% blocks got fertilized.\"")

timeline.bodyText: The b on blocks should be capitalized
timeline.author: ShaneBeee
